PerfectNetExp.abs: 风信子科共有约30属300-700余种,都是多年生草本植物,有鳞茎,其中许多种类是... 小风信子属 Hyacinthella 蓝铃花属 Hyacinthoides (或 Endymion) 风信子属.

means.word_mean: 1. small genus of perennial bulbs of western Europe and North Africa; sometimes placed in family Hyacinthaceae
